item.description:
Learn to use simple self-hypnosis techniques
to open more fully to the subtle healing energy
of Reiki in order to help yourself and others
to heal.

Enjoy a group hypnosis session designed to
help you allow pure universal life force energy
to become more present in your life.

Additionally, learn an energy meditation technique
that you can use with yourself and clients that
enhances Reiki treatments. This technique opens
the subtle energy system to receive more Reiki
and it seals the Reiki into the subtle energy
system to extend the healing benefits.

Seminar led by Kathryn McGlynn, Hypnotist
and Reiki Master.

Preregistration required as space is limited.

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: Hypnosis Seminar : Hypnosis for the Reiki Practitioner
